name: Wildlife Park Gold Reloaded
description: Establish, create and manage your own amazing zoo, even with extinct animals - and become a Zoo Tycoon! With new UI and full screen resolutions support!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: x86 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8.1 compatible, 64 MB RAM, Pixelshader 1.1, Vertexshader 1.1 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
